channel.title: [Shard] Project [Shard]
channel.description:
Ok i am working on a shard based server, to clear this out THIS IS NOT CREATIVESCAPE. Its just a Blank shard with some content the one graham released. Ok i will need some help from people who have experience with java and coding Private Servers because i am a webdeveloper, i am making a website from scratch no web tools or anything just hand writin might take a month, I am not so much a java coder but im pretty good at java coding. I will post information below of the spots. You must be on and active threw out the day if you havent been on for over 2 - 3 or over a week you will be kicked off the team, If your going on vacation or something then tell us dont just disappear. We want to make shard as real as possiable. There are not many shard bases that are advertised just the creativescape leeched bases.
[B]Goals:[/B]
1. Give Excitement and Enjoyment threwout the Server
2. Add Alot more Content and stuff
3. More Minigames Such as Pest Control and all that
4. 3 or more Quests
5. PvN and PvP Following
6. Npc Clipped
7. Might be more we will see
Application for all the spots:
[CODE] Real Name: Age: What Job you want to Apply For: How long have you been doing that Job/Language for: Email(You can Tell me In Pm if you want): Will you Stay With us: Can we Trust You:[/CODE]
Server Coders:
None
None
Client Coders:
None
None
Interface Maker:
None
None
Graphic Designers:
None
None
Beta Testers
(We Do Not need any Testers right now i will update this post when we do thanks).
Please Post We want Shard to be the best there is

item.title: [Shard] Project [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Real Name:Austin
Age:14
What Job you want to Apply For: Graphic Designer
How long have you been doing that Job/Language for: About 1-2 years
Email(You can Tell me In Pm if you want): Shadows-pking@hotmail.com
Will you Stay With us: Tell the end…
Can we Trust You: Umm I use GIMP if your asking that :d, Im not sure what to answer to that…

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard] Project [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @srixs srixs
item.description:
@srixs wrote:

Real Name: Jordan
Age: 15
What Job you want to Apply For: Graphic Design/arts
How long have you been doing that Job/Language for: since I could open Paint (I will major in graphic design
Email(You can Tell me In Pm if you want): jordy805@live.com
Will you Stay With us: if you choose me then of course. Whenever you need a logo, banner, etc. just let me know.
Can we Trust You: Yes. I use photoshop 7.0, SAI paint tool, printers, scanners, paint, GIMP, and whatever else will get the job done.

Example of my work is attached

Thank you…

Read full topic
